name: One Barbarian Futa Tribe Chapter 2: Red
name_original: One Barbarian Futa Tribe Chapter 2: Red
description:
This is a short visual novel at around 6000 words. In this visual novel, you will make several choices that slightly change how the story plays out. There is a focus on adult content and themes. This visual novel is designed to be the second chapter in a larger series.

In this visual novel, you play as Ezra. After being taken prisoner by a crazy Barbarian, you find yourself taken back to their dismal camp. Surrounded by four different hung futas, you now have to try to find a way to escape. But, do you even want to escape?
